00025 template <class ParameterType>
00026 class TImageProcessorCompBase: public iproc::CSyncProcessorCompBase
00027 {
00028 public:
00029        typedef iproc::CSyncProcessorCompBase BaseClass;
00030 
00031        TImageProcessorCompBase();
00032 
00033        I_BEGIN_BASE_COMPONENT(TImageProcessorCompBase)
00034               I_ASSIGN(m_paramsIdAttrPtr, "ParamsId", "ID of processor parameter", false, "ParamsId");
00035               I_ASSIGN(m_preprocessorCompPtr, "Preprocessor", "Pre-processing operator", false, "Preprocessor");
00036        I_END_COMPONENT
00037 
00038        // reimplemented (iproc::IProcessor)
00039        virtual int DoProcessing(
00040                             const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr,
00041                             const istd::IPolymorphic* inputPtr,
00042                             istd::IChangeable* outputPtr);

00047                             const ParameterType* parameterPtr,

00049                             iimg::IBitmap& outputImage) = 0;

00068 // reimplemented (iproc::IProcessor)
00069 
00070 template <class ParameterType>
00071 int TImageProcessorCompBase<ParameterType>::DoProcessing(
00072                      const iprm::IParamsSet* paramsPtr,
00073                      const istd::IPolymorphic* inputPtr,
00074                      istd::IChangeable* outputPtr)
00075 {
00076        if (outputPtr == NULL){
00077               return TS_OK;
00078        }
00079 
00080        const iimg::IBitmap* inputBitmapPtr = dynamic_cast<const iimg::IBitmap*>(inputPtr);
00081        iimg::IBitmap* outputBitmapPtr = dynamic_cast<iimg::IBitmap*>(outputPtr);
00082 
00083        if ((inputBitmapPtr == NULL) || (outputBitmapPtr == NULL)){
00084               return TS_INVALID;
00085        }
00086 
00087        if (m_timerPtr.IsValid()){
00088               m_timerPtr->Start();
00089        }
00090 
00091        iimg::CGeneralBitmap bufferBitmap;
00092 
00093        if (m_preprocessorCompPtr.IsValid()){
00094               int retVal = m_preprocessorCompPtr->DoProcessing(paramsPtr, inputBitmapPtr, &bufferBitmap);
00095               if (retVal == TS_OK){
00096                      inputBitmapPtr = &bufferBitmap;
00097               }
00098        }
00099 
00100        // create output image:
00101        outputBitmapPtr->CopyFrom(*inputBitmapPtr);
00102 
00103        const ParameterType* processorParamsPtr = NULL;  
00104        if (paramsPtr != NULL && m_paramsIdAttrPtr.IsValid()){
00105               processorParamsPtr = dynamic_cast<const ParameterType*>(paramsPtr->GetParameter(m_paramsIdAttrPtr->GetValue().ToString()));
00106        }
00107        
00108        // do image processing:
00109        if (!ProcessImage(processorParamsPtr, *inputBitmapPtr, *outputBitmapPtr)){
00110               return TS_INVALID;
00111        }
00112        
00113        if (m_timerPtr.IsValid()){
00114               double processingTime = m_timerPtr->GetElapsed();
00115 
00116               SendInfoMessage(0, istd::CString("Processed in ") + istd::CString::FromNumber(processingTime * 1000) + "ms");
00117        }
00118 
00119        return TS_OK;
00120 }
